sourcesContent:
Home Me
import { Component, OnChanges, OnInit, SimpleChanges } from '@angular/core'; import { Router } from '@angular/router'; import { GuardService } from 'src/app/services/guard.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-header', templateUrl: './header.component.html', styleUrls: ['./header.component.css'] }) export class HeaderComponent implements OnInit{ isLogged = false; constructor(private guardService: GuardService, private router :Router){ this.isLogged = this.getIsLogged(); this.ngOnInit(); } getIsLogged(){ return this.guardService.authorized(); } ngOnInit(): void { } }
